L2_gloss: The first letter of the Ewe alphabet, called a and written in the Latin script.
Adam (biblical figure), A male given name.
divination (clarification of this definition is needed)
black (relating to a person of African descent)
the quality or sign of a person or thing that is marvelous or causes wonder.
back (part of body between neck and spine)
English pertaining to England or pertaining to the English language

back (toward the rear or far from the main area)
back (the reverse side or farthest away from the front)

A female given name.
Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe La le Eʋegbe me, Hebritɔwo 11:11
Le xɔse me Sara ke hɑ̃ kpɔ ŋusẽ bena, wòfɔ fu, eye wòdzi vi le eƒe nyagɑ̃kuku me; elabena ebu amesi na ŋugbedodoe la nuteƒewɔlae.

(biblical) Sarai
Ŋɔŋlɔ Kɔkɔe La le Eʋegbe me, Mose I 12:5
Eye Abram kplɔ srɔ̃a Sarai kple tɔgɑ̃yɔvia Lot, eye wotsɔ woƒe kesinɔnuwo katɑ̃ kple amesiwo katɑ̃ wokpɔ le Xaran la, eye woʋu, be woayi Kanaan-nyigba dzi, eye wova Kanaan-nyigba la dzi.
